text: 4.10 Sng 36.6, 1 Ko 4.11-12, 1 Ti 2.3-4 God ne bɨ pel mɨdep, bɨ kasɨn gep mɨdeb. Ne binɨb okok mɨdupsek tɨg asɨk din agɨl nɨgaknɨŋ, binɨb nop gos lɨnopun okok, chɨnop tɨg asɨk dup. Chɨn nop gos lɨnopun okok, ne chɨnop gek mɨdtep gɨnɨgabun gos ak nɨŋɨd kod mɨdobun. Anɨb ak nɨm God anɨgup tek nɨŋɨd, mɨnek mɨnek kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl nep gon amub.
